title: EPA reverses bans on TCE, asbestos, and ethylene oxide under industry executives
summary: Under Nancy Beck (former American Chemistry Council) and Lynn Dekleva (ex-DuPont), EPA moved to reverse bans on trichloroethylene, asbestos, and ethylene oxide - chemicals linked to cancer and neurological disorders.

sources.title: TCE Is Linked to Heart Defects in Babies, Cancer and Parkinson's. Republicans in Congress Want to Reverse a Ban on It.
Trump puts industry insiders in charge of overseeing chemical safety

notes: Beck previously worked to reverse these same chemical safety rules as industry lobbyist
